assignment

Class AccountableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment.AccountableObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractNoNullList, Address, Aircraft, Booking, Company, Flight, Meal, Person, Phone, Price, Seat

    public abstract class AccountableObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An abstract object that is able to provide a UUID to its children, and also perform accounting in the form maintaining a creation and modified date, along with a record of the user that performed them.
    Author:
    Graham Fairweather
    See Also:
    UUID, Serialized Form
